titleStmt.title: The spy discovering the danger of Arminian heresie and Spanish trecherie: written by I.R.
titleStmt.author: Russell, John, d. 1688.
Rhodes, John, minister of Enborne, attributed name.
Robinson, John, 1575?-1625, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the successors of Giles Thorp],

notesStmt.note: I.R. = John Russell. Also sometimes attributed to John Rhodes and to John Robinson.
The imprint is false; printed in Amsterdam by the successors of Giles Thorp (STC).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
